snippet: Because of an investigation by prosecutors, the firm charged with auditing the N.B.A. players union is withholding further information about a contract between the union and a financial services company.
abstract: Law firm charged with auditing NBA players union is withholding further information about suspicious contract between union and financial services company because federal prosecutors are investigating matter themselves.
lead_paragraph: Because of an investigation by prosecutors, the firm charged with auditing the N.B.A. players union is withholding further information about a contract between the union and a financial services company.

headline.seo: Law Firm Withholding Information on N.B.A. Union’s Contract
headline.main: Law Firm Changes Course on Releasing Information on Suspicious Union Contract
headline.print_headline: Law Firm Changes Course on Releasing Information on Suspicious Union Contract
